import React from 'react'; function Clarification() { return ( <>

Clarification Text Relating Personal Data Processing

Content
  • Who is the Data Controller?
  • What is the Purpose and Legal Grounds for Processing Your Personal Data?
  • To Whom and For What Purposes Can Your Personal Data Be Transferred?
  • Method for Collecting Personal Data and its Retention Period
  • Your Rights Determined in Article 11 of the KVKK and Methods to Contact Us

This Clarification Text has been prepared pursuant to Article 10 of the Turkish Protection of Personal Data Law no. 6698 (“KVKK”) and the Communiqué on Principles and Procedures to be Followed to Fulfill the Obligation to Inform.

Who is the Data Controller?

CUBEDOTS TURKEY GAYRİMENKUL TEKNOLOJİLERİ LİMİTED ŞİRKETİ (Cubedots, “we”, “us”, or “our”) located at the address Cumhuriyet Mah., Silahşör Cd., Bomonti Business Center, D:No:8/23-24, Şişli/İstanbul who carries out its services via the Site www.cubedots.com(“Site”).

What is the Purpose and Legal Grounds for Processing Your Personal Data?

Your personal data (“Data Subject”, “yours”, “your”, “you”) may be processed for different purposes and for different legal reasons, depending on your relationship with Cubedots. After you have determined your relevant data subject category, you can find in detail which of your personal data is processed and on which legal grounds from the table below.

Such information has been written in much detail as possible and we would like to remind you that you may fall into more than one data subject category.

In absence of legal grounds stipulated in Article 5/2 and 6/3 of the KVKK, your personal data may only be processed based on your explicit consent. We would like to remind you that you can always withdraw your consent.

If you give your consent, as Cubedots, we will process your personal data by sending you promotional, advertising and marketing materials related to our fields of activity and scope of services, as well as e-mails, sms, containing detailed information about our services, and by phone calls, in order to make you informed on our services, activities and events and to provide your participation in the campaigns we organize. At the same time, we will store your personal data in order to send you the materials related to these service details and our advertising-marketing materials periodically.

Data Subject Data Category and the Personal Data Processed Purpose(s) for Processing Legal Ground for Processing
Online User, Visitor Transaction Security Information (username and passwords, IP address and other online identifiers, account settings, browser type and versions, time zone and location settings, browser plug-in types and versions, operating systems and platform, other technologies on the devices you use to access our Site and information about how you use our Site, products and services) Execution of Information Security Processes, Execution of Audit / Ethical Activities, Execution / Control of Business Activities, Execution of Retention and Archive Activities, Ensuring the Security of Data Controllers Operations, Giving Information to Authorized Persons, Institutions and Organizations, Execution of Activities in Compliance with Legislation, Execution of Sales Processes for Goods / Services, Tracking Requests / Compliants Clearly provided for by the laws, Mandatory for the data controller to be able to perform its legal obligations, Mandatory for the legitimate interests of the controller, provided that this processing shall not violate the fundamental rights and freedoms of the data subject, Explicit consent
Potential Customer
ID Information (Name, Surname, Turkish ID no, Information written on the first page of the ID)
Contact Information (Telephone no, Address, E-mail address)
Security of Physical Media (Entrance – exit records, camera records)
Customer Information (Voice record, price information, customer comments, chat records) and Vehicle Information (License plate, model-make, license information)
 Execution of Financial and Accounting Affairs, Conducting Communication Activities, Execution / Control of Business Activities, Execution of Company / Product / Services Commitment Processes, Monitoring and Execution of Legal Affairs, Execution of Purchasing Processes for Goods / Services, Execution of Sales Processes for Goods / Services, Execution of After Sales Support Services for Goods / Services, Execution of Customer Relationship Management Processes, Execution of Activities for Customer Satisfaction, Execution of Marketing Analysis Studies, Execution of Advertising / Campaign / Promotion Processes, Tracking Requests / Complaints, Execution of Marketing Processes of Products / Services, Execution of Retention and Archive Activities Clearly provided for by the laws, Mandatory for the data controller to be able to perform its legal obligations, Necessary provided that the data of the parties is directly related to the conclusion or fulfilment of that contract, Mandatory for the legitimate interests of the controller, provided that this processing shall not violate the fundamental rights and freedoms of the data subject, Data made available to the public by the data subject himself, Explicit consent
Customer
ID Information (Name, Surname, Turkish ID no, Signature, Information written on the first page of the ID)
Contact Information (Telephone no, Address, E-mail address)
Security of Physical Media (Entrance – exit records, camera records)
Customer Information (Voice record, price information, customer comments, chat records) and Vehicle Information (License plate, model-make, license information)
Legal Action Information (Lawsuit information, information written in legal notices judicial/administrative correspondences)
Financial Information (Credit card details, IBAN details)
 Execution of Financial and Accounting Affairs, Conducting Communication Activities, Execution of Company / Product / Services Commitment Processes, Execution of Activities in Compliance with Legislation, Monitoring and Execution of Legal Affairs, Conducting Business Continuity Activities, Execution / Control of Business Activities, Execution of Purchasing Processes for Goods / Services, Execution of Sales Processes for Goods / Services, Execution of After Sales Support Services for Goods / Services, Execution of Customer Relationship Management Processes, Execution of Activities for Customer Satisfaction, Execution of Advertising / Campaign / Promotion Processes Execution of Retention and Archive Activities, Execution of Agreement and Membership Processes, Tracking Requests / Complaints, Information to Authorized Persons, Institutions and Organizations Clearly provided for by the laws, Necessary provided that the data of the parties is directly related to the conclusion or fulfilment of that contract, Mandatory for the data controller to be able to perform its legal obligations, Mandatory for the legitimate interests of the controller, provided that this processing shall not violate the fundamental rights and freedoms of the data subject, Data made available to the public by the data subject himself, Explicit consent
Employee Candidate
ID Information (Name, Surname, Date/Place of birth)
Contact Information (Telephone no, Address, E-mail address)
Personnel Information (Military service information and information in their CV) and Work Experience Information (Foreign languages known, Educational/Occupational background)
 Conducting Employee Candidate Recruitment and Onboarding Processes, Conducting Communication Activities, Planning of Human Resources Policies and Processes, Conducting Interviews, Execution of Business Activities Necessary provided that the data of the parties is directly related to the conclusion or fulfilment of that contract, Mandatory for the data controller to be able to perform its legal obligations, Mandatory for the legitimate interests of the controller, provided that this processing shall not violate the fundamental rights and freedoms of the data subject, Data made available to the public by the data subject himself, Explicit consent
Employee
ID Information (Name, Surname, Information written in ID, Information relating to minimum living allowance (AGİ), SGK register no, Signature)
Contact Information (Telephone no, Address, E-mail address)
Personnel Information (Military service information and information in their CV, permission form, Disciplinary proceeding information, Performance evaluation) and Work Experience Information (Foreign languages known, Educational/Occupational background)
Legal Action Information (Lawsuit/legal proceeding information, information written in legal notices judicial/administrative correspondences)
Transaction Security Information (IP address, Entering-exiting Sites, E-mail traffic logs, Company e-mail address archive, Username and password)
Financial Information (Salary, Debt/Balance information, Bank details)
Health Information (Disability, Health report, Blood type)
 Conducting Communication Activities, Execution / Control of Business Activities, Tracking Requests / Complaints, Giving Information to Authorized Persons, Institutions and Organizations, Execution of Activities in Compliance with Legislation, Execution of Agreement Processes, Execution of Financial and Accounting Affairs, Monitoring and Execution of Legal Affairs, Execution for Retention and Archive Activities Clearly provided for by the laws, Necessary provided that the data of the parties is directly related to the conclusion or fulfilment of that contract, Mandatory for the data controller to be able to perform its legal obligations, Mandatory for the legitimate interests of the controller, provided that this processing shall not violate the fundamental rights and freedoms of the data
Business Partner
ID Information (Name, Surname, Turkish/Tax ID no)
Contact Information (Telephone no, Address, E-mail address)
Legal Action Information (Lawsuit information, information written in legal notices judicial/administrative correspondences)
Financial Information (Bank details)

To Whom and For What Purposes Can Your Personal Data Be Transferred?

Your collected personal data can be transferred to legally authorized agencies and our local business partners within the framework of the conditions and purposes for processing personal data outlined in Article 8 and Article 9 of the KVKK in order to fulfill our legal obligations and for you to take advantage of our services. Your collected personal data may be transferred to our British shareholder and Indian information technology support based on your explicit consent.

Method for Collecting Personal Data and its Retention Period

Your personal data collected during your or during employment / business relationship will be processed and acquired in any written or electronic format in line with the purposes outlined above or based on your explicit consent and stored in databases locally and/or abroad (Microsoft Azure in Holland, West Europe , AWS, DigitalOcean Etc.).

Your personal data will be kept during the period stated in the relevant legislation or the term necessary for the processing purposes. Your data will be deleted, destroyed or anonymized ex officio or upon your request, in case the legal grounds requiring data processing are eliminated.

Your Rights Determined in Article 11 of the KVKK and Methods to Contact Us

As a data subject, we would like to remind you that you have the following rights in accordance with Article 11 of the KVKK:

  • Find out whether or not personal data has been processed,
  • Request information about the processing of personal data if it has occurred,
  • Find out the purpose of processing the personal data and whether or not it was processed for this purpose,
  • Know third parties to whom personal data was transferred either domestically or abroad,
  • Request that personal data processed incorrectly or incompletely be corrected and request that third parties to whom the transaction in correction was made are informed,
  • Request that personal data be erased or destroyed if the reasons that required processing no longer apply in spite of the fact that it was processed in accordance with the provisions of the PPDL or other applicable legislation, and request that third parties to whom personal data was transferred as part of this process be informed,
  • Object to any unfavourable consequences arising from the analysis of processed data via exclusively automatic systems,
  • Request remedy of damages if they incur losses due to the unlawful processing of personal data.

You may transmit your applications and requests regarding personal data to Cubedots through the Data Subject Application Form. After consideration your application, we respond to you as soon as possible, but no later than 30 days from the date we receive your application.

) } export default Clarification;
